Package model

Class BazaStudenata

java.lang.Object
model.BazaStudenata
public class BazaStudenata
extends java.lang.Object
This class serves as a database for a student and implements methods for its modification.
Author:
Dusan Lekic

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void brisanjeNepolozenih()
    This method deletes an exam from the list of the failed exams.

      public java.lang.Object getValueAt​(int row, int column)

    • dodajStudenta

      public void dodajStudenta​(java.lang.String prezime, java.lang.String ime, java.util.Date datumR, java.lang.String adresaSt, java.lang.String kontaktTl, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String brojInd, int godUp, int godSt, Student.Status status, double prosek)
      This method adds a student to the database.
      Parameters:
      prezime - surname of the student
      ime - name of the student
      datumR - birth date of the student
      adresaSt - address of the student
      kontaktTl - contact info of the student
      email - email of the student
      brojInd - index number of the student
      godUp - enrollment year of the student
      godSt - current year of study of the student
      status - status of the student
      prosek - GPA of the student

    • izbrisiStudenta

      public void izbrisiStudenta​(java.lang.String brojInd)
      Deletes the student with the given index number.
      Parameters:
      brojInd - index number of the student which we want to delete

    • izmeniStudenta

      public void izmeniStudenta​(int index, java.lang.String prezime, java.lang.String ime, java.util.Date datumR, java.lang.String adresaSt, java.lang.String kontaktTl, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String brojInd, int godUp, int godSt, Student.Status status, double prosek)
      This method changes the info of the student with the given index.
      Parameters:
      index - selected index of the student which we want to change
      prezime - surname of the student
      ime - name of the student
      datumR - birth date of the student
      adresaSt - address of the student
      kontaktTl - contact info of the student
      email - email of the student
      brojInd - index number of the student
      godUp - enrollment year of the student
      godSt - current year of study of the student
      status - status of the student
      prosek - GPA of the student

      public void upisiOcenu​(java.lang.String sifraP, java.lang.String imeP, java.lang.Integer ocena, java.lang.String datumUpisa)
      This method adds a grade from an exam which student passed.
      Parameters:
      sifraP - code of the subject
      imeP - name of the subject
      ocena - grade which was given
      datumUpisa - date when the grade was given
